title: Online Learning and Critical Thinking Enhancement Program in Nursing Education

context.prior_knowledge: No foundational nursing theory or clinical practice experience
context.additional_context: An online course utilizing VR simulation in a smartphone-centric limited-technology environment. Research-based design comparing traditional learning methods with online interventions

learning_goals: Learners improve critical thinking skills by over 20% by analyzing patient cases in an online simulation environment.
Learners apply an evidence-based approach to decision-making processes at over 80% proficiency through weekly VR-based clinical scenarios.
Learners improve logical problem-solving skills by 15% through peer assessment in online discussion forums.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
